name: Data warden review return rates
description: Rate of first line checker reviews being returned to reporting officers.

dataset.name: Locations
dataset.query:
select DISTINCT(location) as location
from report
where source = 'DPS' and location not in ('NORTH', 'SOUTH')
UNION ALL
select 'All locations' as location

dataset.name: Incident Types
dataset.query:
SELECT DISTINCT(description) FROM constant_type_family
UNION ALL
select 'All incident types' as description

dataset.name: Return rate per location by incident type per month
dataset.query:
select *, ROUND((CAST(sent_back as numeric)/reports_reviewed)*100, 1) as per_returned
from (
         select Cast(Date_trunc('month', correction_requested_at) AS DATE) as month, to_char(min(correction_requested_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as min_date, to_char(max(correction_requested_at), 'DD/MM/YYYY') as max_date,
                COALESCE(location, 'All locations') as location,
                COALESCE(incident_type, 'All incident types') as incident_type,
                COUNT(report_id) as reports_reviewed,
                COUNT(CASE when user_action = 'REQUEST_CORRECTION' then report_id END) as sent_back,
                COUNT(CASE when user_action <> 'REQUEST_CORRECTION' then report_id END) as completed
         from (
                  select report_id, correction_requested_at, location, description as incident_type, sequence, user_action, prev_dw_action, following_dw_action
                  from (
                           select report_id, sequence, user_action, correction_requested_at, ct.description, r.location,
                                  first_value(sequence) over (partition by report_id order by sequence) as first_dw_sequence,
                                  lag(user_action) OVER (partition by report_id order by sequence) as prev_dw_action,
                                  lag(user_action) OVER (partition by report_id order by sequence desc) as following_dw_action
                           from correction_request as cr
                                    left join (
                               select id, source, type, location from report
                           ) as r
                                              on cr.report_id = r.id
                                    left join (
                               select code, description from constant_type
                           ) as ct
                                              on r.type = ct.code
                           where r.source = 'DPS' and user_type = 'DATA_WARDEN' and r.location not in ('NORTH', 'SOUTH')
                           order by report_id desc, sequence asc)
                  where (sequence = first_dw_sequence and user_action <> 'HOLD') or (sequence = first_dw_sequence + 1 and prev_dw_action = 'HOLD'))
         group by Cast(Date_trunc('month', correction_requested_at) AS DATE), ROLLUP(location), ROLLUP(incident_type))

report.name: % of reviews returned per location by incident type / month
report.description: Percentage of first line checkers reviews returned to reporting officers per location by type per month.
